name: Demonic Coffee Break
description:
On a late friday night, after working for hours,  you decided to take a coffee break but SOMEHOW you accidentally summoned a demon!

Now you have to find a way to survive de night without dying or burning your entire apartment!

---------

This game features:

-A friendly demon that may or may not end up burning something up

-3 (bad?) endings and 3 alternatives for the game end

-And more to come ^^
